alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hamilton County through 400 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Durant Campground, or 8 miles northwest of Indian Lake, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blue Mountain Lake, Forked Lake Public Campground, Lake Durant Campground, Eagle Nest, Catlin Lake and Deerland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
